welcome.title: Project Management Application
welcome.subTitle: We are glad to present to your attention our application PMApp. With it, you can easily manage your project, be aware of all the tasks and control the progress of their implementation.
welcome.subTitle2: Start with board, lists and cards. Manage projects, organize tasks, and build team spirit.

page404.title: Ouch! Page not found!
page404.text: Sorry, we can't find the page you requested. You may have entered the address incorrectly.

profile.title: Profile
profile.changeNameHelper: Name must contain only letters and be at least 3 characters long
profile.changeLoginHelper: Login must contain only letters and numbers and be at least 3 characters long
profile.changePasswordHelper: Password must contain only letters and numbers and be at least 6 characters long

signUp.title: Registration
signUp.valid1: Name must contain only letters and be more than 2 characters
signUp.valid2: Login must contain only letters and numbers and be more than 3 characters
signUp.valid3: Password must contain only letters and numbers and be more than 6 characters

deleteModal.boardText: Are you sure you want to delete the board?
deleteModal.columnText: Are you sure you want to delete the column?
deleteModal.taskText: Are you sure you want to delete the task?
